# instacart-order-history-download

## What does instacart-order-history-download do?

instacart-order-history-download gets your Instacart order history to JSON, CSV, or text. instacart-order-history-download outputs order dates, totals, retailers, and full item details.

## How do I install instacart-order-history-download?

Install instacart-order-history-download with Homebrew:

```
brew tap mike-vincent/instacart-order-history-download
brew install instacart-order-history-download
```

## How do I get my session cookie?

Log into instacart.com, open DevTools â†’ Cookies, and copy `_instacart_session_id`.

## How do I use instacart-order-history-download?

Run instacart-order-history-download with your session cookie:

```
instacart-order-history-download --instacart-session-id "YOUR_SESSION_ID"
```

## Examples

```
# Fetch all orders as JSON
instacart-order-history-download --instacart-session-id "YOUR_SESSION_ID"

# Last 6 months as CSV
instacart-order-history-download --instacart-session-id "YOUR_SESSION_ID" --months 6 -f csv

# Last 30 days to a file
instacart-order-history-download --instacart-session-id "YOUR_SESSION_ID" --days 30 -o orders.json

# Since January 2024
instacart-order-history-download --instacart-session-id "YOUR_SESSION_ID" --since 2024-01-01

# Human-readable text output
instacart-order-history-download --instacart-session-id "YOUR_SESSION_ID" -f text

# Quiet mode (no progress output)
instacart-order-history-download --instacart-session-id "YOUR_SESSION_ID" -q > orders.json
```
